title: Pytorch Release Notes
body_html:
Just a cosmetic issue that I wanted to point out, under the pytorch 0.4 release that documentation lists the migration guide 3 times. Not sure if some one wants to fix that.
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/releases/tag/v0.4.0

'''
Please read the migration guide if you have code in a previous version of PyTorch that you would like to migrate.
Please read the migration guide if you have code in a previous version of PyTorch that you would like to migrate.
Please read the migration guide if you have code in a previous version of PyTorch that you would like to migrate.
'''
